content: I am so sorry to hear of your loss, especially since there was such a wide mix of hope and elation and disappointment and then hope, elation, etc all over again. Such an emotional roller coaster must have been hard to take for you and your wife and sons and the rest of your family. My heart and tears go out to you and I hope that this system will be fixed soon. Take care and my prayers are with you and your sons and family members.
